member.name: P:IBMMobilePush.Forms.SDK.Badge
member.summary: Gets or sets the badge.

member.name: M:IBMMobilePush.Forms.SDK.ManualLocationInitialization
member.summary: Manually initialize location services for SDK, requires location's autoInitialize=FALSE MceConfig.plist flag. This is used to delay location services initalization until desired.

member.name: M:IBMMobilePush.Forms.SDK.ManualSdkInitialization
member.summary: Manually initialize SDK, is used to wait until an event occurs before beginning to interact with the IBM servers. For example, you might not want to create a userid/channelid until after a user logs into your system. Requires autoInitialize=FALSE MceConfig.plist flag.

member.name: T:IBMMobilePush.Forms.LogLevel
member.summary: This enumerated type represents logging levels.

member.name: F:IBMMobilePush.Forms.LogLevel.NONE
member.summary: This value represents no logging.

member.name: F:IBMMobilePush.Forms.LogLevel.ERROR
member.summary: This value represents logging only error messages.

member.name: F:IBMMobilePush.Forms.LogLevel.WARN
member.summary: This value represents logging error and warning messages.

member.name: F:IBMMobilePush.Forms.LogLevel.INFO
member.summary: This value represents logging error, warning and informational messages.

member.name: F:IBMMobilePush.Forms.LogLevel.VERBOSE
member.summary: This value represents all logging messages turned on.

member.name: T:IBMMobilePush.Forms.Logging
member.summary: This class logs to the console.

member.name: M:IBMMobilePush.Forms.Logging.Error(System.String)
member.summary: Logs an error message for the specified message.

member.name: M:IBMMobilePush.Forms.Logging.Error(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Logs an error message for the specified message and exception.

member.name: M:IBMMobilePush.Forms.Logging.Warn(System.String)
member.summary: Logs warning and error messages for the specified message.

member.name: M:IBMMobilePush.Forms.Logging.Warn(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Logs warning and error messages for the specified message and exception.

member.name: M:IBMMobilePush.Forms.Logging.Info(System.String)
member.summary: Logs informational, warning, and error messages for the specified message.

member.name: M:IBMMobilePush.Forms.Logging.Info(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Logs informational, warning, and error messages for the specified message and exception.

member.name: M:IBMMobilePush.Forms.Logging.Verbose(System.String)
member.summary: Logs all messages, including events that are sent to the server and callback information, for the specified message.

member.name: M:IBMMobilePush.Forms.Logging.Verbose(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Logs all messages, including events that are sent to the server and callback information, for the specified message and exception.
